Add groups stored in "_ldap_rules/groups_id" special input

Have I the right to "create" the Object
Default is true and check entity if the objet is entity assign
May be overloaded if needed
Renvoie
boolean

getFromDBbyDn() getFromDBbyDnUser UsergetFromDBbyDn
getFromDBbyDn ( $user_dn)
Retrieve a user from the database using it's dn.
Paramètres
string$user_dn
dn of the user
Renvoie
boolean
We use the 'user_dn_hash' field instead of 'user_dn' for performance reasons. The 'user_dn_hash' field is a hashed version of the 'user_dn' field and is indexed in the database, making it faster to search.

ldap_get_user_groups() ldap_get_user_groupsUser Userldap_get_user_groups
ldap_get_user_groups ( $ds, $ldap_base_dn, $user_dn, $group_condition, $group_member_field, $use_dn, $login_field)
Get all groups a user belongs to.
Paramètres
resource$ds
ldap connection
string$ldap_base_dn
Basedn used
string$user_dn
Basedn of the user
string$group_condition
group search condition
string$group_member_field
group field member in a user object
boolean$use_dn
search dn of user ($login_field=$user_dn) in group_member_field
string$login_field
user login field
Renvoie
array Groups of the user located in [0][$group_member_field] in returned array
